title: Stakeholder Catalog Schema
description: JSON Schema for validating stakeholder catalog YAML files in the Public Transportation Information System architecture

stakeholders.description: List of stakeholders in the public transportation information system

id.description: Unique identifier for the stakeholder following the pattern stakeholder:XXX

name.description: The name of the stakeholder or stakeholder group

description.description: Detailed description of who this stakeholder is and their context

role.description: Primary role of the stakeholder in the transportation system

interests.description: List of key interests, concerns, or requirements the stakeholder has

influence.description: Level of influence the stakeholder has over the system development and operation

priority.description: Priority level for stakeholder engagement and requirements consideration
